title: Sport in British Burmah, Assam, and the Cassyah and Jyntiah Hills
creator: Pollok, Fitzwilliam Thomas
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Pollok, Fitzwilliam Thomas: Sport in British Burmah, Assam, and the Cassyah and Jyntiah Hills  with notes on sport in the hilly districts of the Northern division, Madras Presidency, indicating the best localities in those countries for sport, with natural history notes, illustrations of the people, scenery, and game, together with maps to guide the traveller or sportsman, and hints on weapons, fishing-tackle, etc., best suited for killing game met with in those provinces ; in two volumes. London  Berlin
alternative: with notes on sport in the hilly districts of the Northern division, Madras Presidency, indicating the best localities in those countries for sport, with natural history notes, illustrations of the people, scenery, and game, together with maps to guide the traveller or sportsman, and hints on weapons, fishing-tackle, etc., best suited for killing game met with in those provinces ; in two volumes
